_header: Whoso that will for grace sue
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 1977
_description: The need for constancy in love, ascribed to King Henry VIII — two 6-line stanzas

BLAdd31922.First Lines: Who so that wyll for grace sewhys entent must nedys be trew…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …But perfite in dede and betwene twowherfor then shuld we yt excho
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notation repeated twice more for three voices,
